name: Don't Drink: Ultimate Party Game
description:
==== AWARDED BEST PARTY GAME OF 2016 ====

The only drinking game you will need to take your party to the next level!
Take a card and face random crazy challenges.

Missed? Drink!
Gave up? Drink!
Refused to do it? DRINK!!!

Gather all your drinking friends, stay sober and remember: DON'T DRINK!
